ext_description.p: An Altered_package is a type of . An Altered_package describes a that has been modified in some manner from a reference . The material or shape properties of the Altered_packaged are different from the reference .
ext_description.example: Examples of alteration include trimming of the terminals, prebending of the terminals, tinning of the terminals for solderability, or more than one of these.

Figure illustrates some of the different forms a package may take when it is installed into an assembly. The original form on the left is in the role of to_be_altered for the forms on the right. The altered forms are identified and tracked by an enterprise.
ext_description.note: Most Altered_packages are a result of terminal alteration.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the package_to_be_altered specifies the that is a reference for the Altered_package.
the of_geometric_status specifies the of the package.

ext_description.p: An Altered_package_terminal is a type of . An Altered_package_terminal is one or more of a , a , or a . An Altered_package_terminal describes a that is the result of a modification process. Material or shape properties are different from the reference terminal.
ext_description.example: The modification process may be performed prior to installing the occurrence of the onto a Printed circuit board.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the associated_definition specifies the role of the for the Altered_package_terminal.
the terminal_to_be_altered specifies the that will be modified for the Altered_package_terminal.

A Length_trimmed_terminal is a type of . A Length_trimmed_terminal describes the prepared length of a terminal accomplished prior to its assembly to the printed circuit assembly. The prepared length is equivalent to the as delivered length.
the minimum_trimmed_length specifies the role of the for the shortest finished length of the Length_trimmed_terminal.
the maximum_trimmed_length specifies the role of the for the longest finished length of the Length_trimmed_terminal.
A Surface_prepped_terminal is a type of that defines a modification to its surface condition, for solderability or other reasons, prior to its installation on an during the assembly of a .
the surface_preparation specifies the for modification to the surface finish of the Surface_prepped_terminal.
A Shape_formed_terminal is a type of a that defines a modification of its shape from its original shape. This shape modification is done in order to facilitate the installation of a in an assembly.
